creator: x00000000@freenet.de
text:
:hover doesn't seem to be implemented (it's explicitly required for "SVG
implementations that support CSS").

Until it is implemented, the implementation status page
<http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/batik/status.html> should list the missing
feature.

creator: x00000000@freenet.de
text:
Created attachment 19830
testcase: the square should turn red when hovered
